ComicInfo.Series: Grimm Fairy Tales Presents Tales from Oz
ComicInfo.Summary:
Under orders from the Emerald Council, Glinda is forced to take on an apprentice! But when presented with a plethora of eager magical candidates at Oz's renowned Abraxas Academy, why does the most powerful witch in Oz have her eye on the sharp-tongued underachiever, Adraste?
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------|---------------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Jarreau Wimberly | 1 | | B | Cover B | Marat Mychaels & Ivan Nunes | 2 | | C | Cover C | Abhishek Malsuni & Neeraj Menon | 3 |
ComicInfo.Title: Adraste
